message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I really think you'll get a lot of value out of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go quite that low, Bob, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll sell it to you for $155.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not quite there yet. I'd be willing to pay $145 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
